00164 // the debug stream
00165 #ifdef DEBUG_LEVEL_1
00166 #   define mc2dbg mc2log
00167 #   define mc2dbg1 mc2log
00168 #else
00169 #   define mc2dbg if (false) mc2log
00170 #   define mc2dbg1 if (false) mc2log
00171 #endif
00172 #ifdef DEBUG_LEVEL_2
00173 #   define mc2dbg2 mc2log
00174 #else

00176 #endif
00177 #ifdef DEBUG_LEVEL_4
00178 #   define mc2dbg4 mc2log

00181 #endif

00200 // small macro that outputs the filename and line of the current line of code
00201 // when used on an ostream.
00202 #define here __FILE__ ":" << __LINE__
00203 
00204 // macro to output an IP numerically
00205 #define prettyPrintIP(a) int((a & 0xff000000) >> 24) << "." \
00206                       << int((a & 0x00ff0000) >> 16) << "." \
00207                       << int((a & 0x0000ff00) >>  8) << "." \
00208                       << int (a & 0x000000ff)
00209 
00210 // macro to output an map id in hex
00211 #define prettyMapIDFill(a) "0x" << setw(8) << setfill('0') << hex << a << dec
00212 #define prettyMapID(a) "0x" << hex << a << dec
00213 
00214 // macro to print citation marks before and after a
00215 #define MC2CITE(a) '"' << (a) << '"'
00216 
00217 #define MC2HEX(a) "0x" << hex << (a) << dec
